Posts.EditableText: Hi, reginaborder. I hope you will try some of my games.  They usually play more well on the PC than on the phone since I've used paper and sound effects which android blocks. I don't know about other systems.Some of them are long with a lot of reading and others less. You don't have to play to the end, either way. One of them is in the shop, for now.
